name: Shave Ice with Fresh Berry Sauce
description: Top your frozen treats with berry sauce from scratch. Many centuries later, shave ice and snow cones are still popular, especially with children, mainly for the sugar rush.

recipeInstructions.text: Put berries and sugar in a saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a simmer, stirring to dissolve sugar. Simmer for about 5 minutes, until sauce has thickened slightly. Cool thoroughly.
For each serving, pile about 1 cup shaved ice into an ice cream glass. Spoon 2 to 3 tablespoons sauce with berries over the top.
